allow: Bash(node -e "const fs = require(''fs''); const content = fs.readFileSync(''src/app/admin/validasi-siswa/page.js'', ''utf-8''); const lines = content.split(''\n''); for(let i = 144; i < 170; i++) { console.log(i + 1 + '': '' + lines[i]); }")

Bash(node -e "const fs = require(''fs''); const content = fs.readFileSync(''src/app/admin/validasi-siswa/page.js'', ''utf-8''); const lines = content.split(''\n''); let openBraces = 0; for(let i = 145; i < 165; i++) { const line = lines[i]; const open = (line.match(/{/g) || []).length; const close = (line.match(/}/g) || []).length; openBraces += open - close; console.log((i+1) + '' ['' + openBraces + '']: '' + line); }")
Bash(timeout 5 bash -c "while true; do sleep 1; done")
